alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:33PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lyon County through 200 PM CDT... At 133 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Americus, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Emporia and Americus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 128 and 133. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 120 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
